sentences.text: The hotel room was ______ gorgeous with stunning sea views.
This approach is ______ different from what we tried before.
Such behaviour is ______ unacceptable in a professional environment.
It's ______ unlikely that we'll finish the project on time.
The new safety procedures are ______ safe for all workers.
Make sure you're ______ aware of the risks before investing.
The restaurant was ______ disgraceful with dirty tables everywhere.
I ______ disagree with your assessment of the situation.
This research is ______ relevant to our current project.
The building is now ______ insured against fire and theft.
It was a ______ cold winter that damaged crops across the region.
The committee was ______ concerned about the rising costs.
The technology sector has become ______ competitive in recent years.
Three workers were ______ injured in the factory accident.
The landscape was ______ beautiful at sunrise.
In my opinion, that film has been ______ overrated by critics.
She was ______ disappointed when she didn't get the promotion.
Many staff members were ______ offended by his comments.
The patient is ______ ill and requires immediate treatment.
The actress looked ______ beautiful in her evening gown.
It's ______ obvious that he doesn't care about the team.
The restaurant is good but ______ expensive for students.
The kitchen was ______ clean after the inspection.
It's ______ impossible to predict the exact outcome.
The injury was ______ painful and required strong medication.
His lack of preparation was ______ obvious to everyone.
The prices at that boutique are ______ cheap for designer clothes.
The hotel rooms were kept ______ clean throughout our stay.
Without funding, the project is ______ impossible to complete.
The whole situation was ______ obvious from the very beginning.
We can't depend ______ him to arrive on time.
I strongly believe ______ equal opportunities for everyone.
Please look ______ the instructions carefully before starting.
You should listen ______ your parents' advice more often.
We've been waiting ______ the bus for twenty minutes.
I don't agree ______ your interpretation of the data.
The company relies ______ exports for most of its revenue.
She's always believed ______ working hard to achieve success.
The teacher pointed ______ several errors in my essay.
They apologised ______ us for the delay.
Don't worry ______ the exam - you'll do fine.
He suffered ______ severe headaches after the accident.
The team consists ______ twelve experienced professionals.
Police are looking ______ the cause of the fire.
We must abide ______ the rules set by the committee.
Students protested ______ the proposed fee increases.
She complained ______ the noise from the construction site.
The country benefits ______ strong trade relationships.
The book consists ______ ten chapters and an appendix.
The manager decided ______ the matter personally.
The roads are always congested during ______ hour.
You were driving well over the ______ limit.
We were stuck in a ______ jam for over an hour.
The nearest ______ stop is just around the corner.
New York and London are in different ______ zones.
The government is concerned about the rising ______ rate.
He suffered a severe ______ attack last month.
English is not my ______ tongue but I speak it fluently.
Let's take a ______ break and discuss this afterwards.
Winning that contract was a ______ point for the company.
The doctor will need to ______ examine your symptoms.
I ______ remember telling you about the meeting yesterday.
The minister ______ refused to answer questions from reporters.
We ______ condemn any form of violence or discrimination.
Make sure you ______ check all the documents before signing.
Local residents ______ complained about the new development.
The company ______ regrets any inconvenience caused to customers.
The business ______ relies on government contracts for income.
You should ______ examine the contract before agreeing to anything.
The government ______ supports renewable energy initiatives.
The view from the mountain was ______ stunning.
Many employees are ______ concerned about job security.
Success depends ______ careful planning and hard work.
We were delayed by a serious ______ jam on the motorway.
The detective ______ examined all the evidence.
The prices at that shop are ______ high.
The patient is recovering ______ a serious illness.
It's ______ impossible to get tickets for the concert now.
Please look ______ these figures and tell me what you think.
The train station is always crowded during ______ hour.
Your answer is ______ wrong - please try again.
It was a ______ cold evening with temperatures below freezing.
I believe ______ giving everyone a fair chance.
My grandfather suffered a ______ attack last year.
The union ______ supports better working conditions.
The bathrooms were kept ______ clean at all times.
Students often worry ______ their exam results.
It's ______ obvious that we need to change our approach.
We've been waiting ______ a response for three weeks.
Drivers must obey the ______ limit in residential areas.
This restaurant is ______ recommended by food critics.
The market has become ______ competitive in recent years.
I completely agree ______ your proposal.
The ______ rate has fallen significantly this year.
The inspector ______ checked every aspect of the building.
The dental procedure was ______ painful.
The committee consists ______ eight members.
Make sure you're ______ prepared before the interview.
You need to listen ______ the instructions carefully.
That decision proved to be a ______ point in her career.
